Image:Ando.gifAndo is also the name in Quenya of the fifth letter of the Tengwar alphabet.  It is the first letter of the second grade or Tyellë
Note: which contains "voiced stops" and it is the second letter in the dental or t-series of consonants
The names of the letters: the Tincotéma.  In the standard spelling of Quenya Ando represents ND.
column4: Note   In all other modes this letter represents D.  The Westron name for this letter is Dó.See Westron Tengwar

The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme AD.
